channel.title: Published Server - but still problem! HELP NEEDED! PLEASE ! :(
channel.description:
Hi there
i published my server. to tell it now, i use Pk planet sources and client. Well i published and it if i type ip in and log in i can, and i can see inventory and mini map (black cirvcle in it) and chat but before u can see the coloured game "world" that part in what u see the trees andn your profile and so on it loggs me out without any warning like connection lost.
what to do else? its almost playable, need help :)
sale

item.title: Published Server - but still problem! HELP NEEDED! PLEASE ! :(
item.dc:creator: @Saletana Saletana
item.description:
@Saletana wrote:

i told already that there isnt a anything telling me something like connection lost or any errror

i log on and see chat area, inventory, mini map and after like 2 seconds: logged off. I see that someone tries to log on on run.bat thing, im gonna post some pics in few minutes and uhm i use pk planet client and sources by spy man

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

item.title: Published Server - but still problem! HELP NEEDED! PLEASE ! :(
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

How the fuck do you publish a server :eek:
On topic: you are either using the wrong client for your source or you are missing interfaces or other required pieces that the server is trying to load through the client. Post the error you get in the client command prompt?
